content.webTitle: CD: Rock review: Cold War Kids, Loyalty for Loyalty

fields.headline: Rock review: Cold War Kids, Loyalty for Loyalty
fields.bodyText: Cold War Kids missed the memo insisting every 2008 indie band have girls and gimmicks. Instead, they were making meat'n'potatoes rock'n'roll that you'll still want to listen to in 10 years' time. Loyalty to Loyalty, an improvement on 2006's filler-heavy debut, is a sincere, if preachy, advertisement for integrity over image.
